message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'll love! It's worth a lot to me, so I'm starting the offer at $20000.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value to you, but my budget allows me to pay up to $15000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I can't go that low right now. How about $17500? I'm willing to negotiate further, but that's my best price for now.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I am only able to pay up to $16000 for the product. Could we meet somewhere in the middle?
